content: you can find the pattern for free on my blog https //rinknitsandstuff com/2025/09/11/olivine-bandana-free-crochet-pattern-2/ you can find the video tutorial on youtube for leftys and rightys **left hand ** https //youtu be/j5hpoukfy78 si=5sij1tbmenjjz9xu **right hand ** https //youtu be/tgccogftepk si=oik15uhox5tyhk5w you can purchase the ad-free pdf here on ravelry or etsy
